mapper.sql: ${alias}.STAGE_ID stageId, ${alias}.STAGE_NAME stageName, ${alias}.THEME_VER_ID themeVerId, ${alias}.APP_ID appId, ${alias}.DUE_NUM dueNum, ${alias}.DUE_UNIT dueUnit, ${alias}.SORT_NO sortNo, ${alias}.ICON_CSS iconCss, ${alias}.BG_CSS bgCss, ${alias}.STAGE_MEMO stageMemo, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ${alias}.IS_NODE isNode, ${alias}.STATUS_CHECK_URL statusCheckUrl, ${alias}.STAGE_CODE stageCode, ${alias}.IS_NEED_STATE isNeedState, ${alias}.SMALL_IMG_PATH smallImgPath, ${alias}.MIDDLE_IMG_PATH middleImgPath, ${alias}.BIG_IMG_PATH bigImgPath, ${alias}.HUGE_IMG_PATH hugeImgPath, ${alias}.IS_IMG_ICON isImgIcon, ${alias}.IS_OPTION_ITEM isOptionItem, ${alias}.IS_SEL_ITEM isSelItem, ${alias}.PARENT_ID parentId, ${alias}.NOPT_ITEM_SHOW_NUM noptItemShowNum, ${alias}.OPT_ITEM_SHOW_NUM optItemShowNum, ${alias}.USE_EL useEl, ${alias}.STAGE_EL stageEl, ${alias}.IS_CHECK_ITEM isCheckItem, ${alias}.LCBSXLX lcbsxlx, ${alias}.DYBZSPJDXH dybzspjdxh, ${alias}.HAND_WAY handWay, ${alias}.USE_ONE_FORM useOneForm, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, ${alias}.IS_SHOW_ITEM isShowItem, ${alias}.DYGJBZFXFW dygjbzfxfw, ${alias}.IS_CHECK_ITEMFORM isCheckItemform, ${alias}.IS_CHECK_PARTFORM isCheckPartform, ${alias}.IS_CHECK_PROJ isCheckProj, ${alias}.IS_CHECK_STAGE isCheckStage
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_PAR_STAGE aps where aps.STAGE_ID = #{id} and aps.IS_DELETED = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_Par_STAGE ( STAGE_ID, STAGE_NAME, STAGE_CODE, THEME_VER_ID, APP_ID, DUE_NUM, DUE_UNIT, SORT_NO, ICON_CSS, BG_CSS, STAGE_MEMO, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, IS_DELETED, IS_NODE, IS_NEED_STATE, STATUS_CHECK_URL, SMALL_IMG_PATH, MIDDLE_IMG_PATH, BIG_IMG_PATH, HUGE_IMG_PATH, IS_IMG_ICON, IS_OPTION_ITEM, IS_SEL_ITEM, PARENT_ID, NOPT_ITEM_SHOW_NUM, OPT_ITEM_SHOW_NUM, USE_EL, STAGE_EL, IS_CHECK_ITEM, LCBSXLX, DYBZSPJDXH, HAND_WAY, USE_ONE_FORM, ROOT_ORG_ID, IS_SHOW_ITEM, DYGJBZFXFW, IS_CHECK_ITEMFORM, IS_CHECK_PARTFORM, IS_CHECK_PROJ, IS_CHECK_STAGE ) values ( #{stageId}, #{stageName}, #{stageCode}, #{themeVerId}, #{appId}, #{dueNum}, #{dueUnit}, #{sortNo}, #{iconCss}, #{bgCss}, #{stageMemo}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{isNode}, #{isNeedState}, #{statusCheckUrl}, #{smallImgPath}, #{middleImgPath}, #{bigImgPath}, #{hugeImgPath}, #{isImgIcon}, #{isOptionItem}, #{isSelItem}, #{parentId}, #{noptItemShowNum}, #{optItemShowNum}, #{useEl}, #{stageEl}, #{isCheckItem}, #{lcbsxlx}, #{dybzspjdxh}, #{handWay}, #{useOneForm}, #{rootOrgId}, #{isShowItem}, #{dygjbzfxfw}, #{isCheckItemform}, #{isCheckPartform}, #{isCheckProj}, #{isCheckStage} )
mapper.update:
update AEA_Par_STAGE
STAGE_ID = #{stageId},
STAGE_NAME = #{stageName},
STAGE_CODE = #{stageCode},
THEME_VER_ID = #{themeVerId},
APP_ID = #{appId},
DUE_NUM = #{dueNum},
DUE_UNIT = #{dueUnit},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo},
ICON_CSS = #{iconCss},
BG_CSS = #{bgCss},
STAGE_MEMO = #{stageMemo},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
IS_NODE = #{isNode},
IS_NEED_STATE = #{isNeedState},
STATUS_CHECK_URL = #{statusCheckUrl},
SMALL_IMG_PATH = #{smallImgPath},
MIDDLE_IMG_PATH = #{middleImgPath},
BIG_IMG_PATH = #{bigImgPath},
HUGE_IMG_PATH = #{hugeImgPath},
IS_IMG_ICON = #{isImgIcon},
IS_OPTION_ITEM = #{isOptionItem},
IS_SEL_ITEM = #{isSelItem},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId},
NOPT_ITEM_SHOW_NUM = #{noptItemShowNum},
OPT_ITEM_SHOW_NUM = #{optItemShowNum},
USE_EL = #{useEl},
STAGE_EL = #{stageEl},
IS_CHECK_ITEM = #{isCheckItem},
LCBSXLX = #{lcbsxlx},
DYBZSPJDXH = #{dybzspjdxh},
HAND_WAY = #{handWay},
USE_ONE_FORM = #{useOneForm},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
IS_SHOW_ITEM = #{isShowItem},
DYGJBZFXFW = #{dygjbzfxfw},
IS_CHECK_ITEMFORM = #{isCheckItemform},
IS_CHECK_PARTFORM = #{isCheckPartform},
IS_CHECK_PROJ = #{isCheckProj},
IS_CHECK_STAGE = #{isCheckStage},
where STAGE_ID = #{stageId}
mapper.delete: update AEA_Par_STAGE set IS_DELETED = '1' where STAGE_ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_PAR_STAGE aps where aps.THEME_VER_ID=#{themeVerId} and aps.IS_DELETED!=1 order By aps.sort_no

SELECT
FROM aea_par_stage aps LEFT JOIN aea_hi_par_stageinst ahps ON aps.STAGE_ID=ahps.STAGE_ID LEFT JOIN aea_hi_iteminst ahi ON ahi.STAGEINST_ID=ahps.STAGEINST_ID WHERE aps.IS_DELETED!=1 and ahi.ITEMINST_ID=#{iteminstId}

select ai.ITEM_ID itemId, ai.ITEM_NAME itemName, org.ORG_NAME orgName, aps.STAGE_NAME stageName from AEA_HI_ITEMINST ahi, AEA_ITEM_basic ai, OPU_OM_ORG org, AEA_PAR_STAGE aps, AEA_HI_PAR_STAGEINST ahps where ahi.ITEM_ID = ai.ITEM_ID AND ahi.STAGEINST_ID = ahps.STAGEINST_ID AND ahps.STAGE_ID = aps.STAGE_ID AND org.ORG_ID = ahi.APPROVE_ORG_ID AND org.ORG_DELETED = '0' AND ahi.STAGEINST_ID = #{stageinstId}

SELECT
FROM aea_hi_applyinst aha LEFT JOIN aea_hi_par_stageinst ahps ON aha.APPLYINST_ID=ahps.APPLYINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_par_stage aps ON aps.STAGE_ID=ahps.STAGE_ID WHERE APPINST_ID=#{applyinstId} AND aha.IS_DELETED !=1 AND aps.IS_DELETED !=1

select aha.APPLYINST_STATE from aea_hi_par_stageinst ahps left join aea_hi_applyinst aha on ahps.applyinst_id = aha.APPLYINST_ID left join aea_applyinst_proj aap on aap.APPLYINST_ID = aha.APPLYINST_ID left join aea_unit_proj aup on aap.proj_info_id = aup.proj_info_id where aha.IS_DELETED = '0' and aap.PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId} and ahps.stage_id = #{stageId} and aup.unit_info_id = #{unitInfoId}

select aha.APPLYINST_STATE from aea_hi_par_stageinst ahps left join aea_hi_applyinst aha on ahps.applyinst_id = aha.APPLYINST_ID left join aea_applyinst_proj aap on aap.APPLYINST_ID = aha.APPLYINST_ID left join aea_proj_linkman apl on aap.proj_info_id = apl.proj_info_id where aha.IS_DELETED = '0' and aap.PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId} and ahps.stage_id = #{stageId} and apl.linkman_info_id = #{linkmanInfoId}

select theme.THEME_ID as themeId, theme.THEME_NAME as themeName, theme.THEME_CODE as themeCode, theme.THEME_VER_ID as themeVerId, stage.STAGE_ID as stageId, stage.STAGE_NAME as stageName, stage.STAGE_CODE as stageCode, stage.IS_NODE as isNode from aea_par_stage stage, ( select theme.THEME_ID, theme.THEME_NAME, theme.THEME_CODE, theme.THEME_TYPE, theme.SORT_NO, theme.CREATE_TIME, themeVer.THEME_VER_ID from aea_par_theme theme, aea_par_theme_ver themeVer
and themeVer.THEME_ID = theme.THEME_ID and theme.IS_DELETED = '0' and theme.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and themeVer.IS_DELETED = '0' and themeVer.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and themeVer.IS_PUBLISH in ('1', '2')
) theme
and stage.THEME_VER_ID = theme.THEME_VER_ID and stage.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and stage.IS_DELETED = '0'
order by theme.THEME_TYPE asc, theme.SORT_NO asc, theme.CREATE_TIME asc
select aps.stage_id stageId from AEA_PAR_STAGE aps where aps.DYBZSPJDXH = #{xh} and aps.IS_DELETED = '0'
